metadata.title: CVE-2018-8013 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Apache Batik 1.x before 1.10, when deserializing subclass of`AbstractDocument`, the class takes a string from the inputStream as theclass name which then use it to call the no-arg constructor of the class.Fix was to check the class type before calling newInstance indeserialization.

criterions.comment: batik: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
